ideas.title: Add useContactsQuery TanStack Query hook
ideas.description: Create a TanStack Query hook for fetching contacts list. The contacts domain exists in queryKeys but no query hook is exported from lib/queries/index.ts.
ideas.rationale: The queryKeys.contacts domain is defined in keys.ts with list() factory method, but there's no corresponding useContactsQuery hook. This follows the same pattern as other list queries (releases, insights, tour dates).
existing_patterns: queryKeys.contacts.list() factory exists
Similar list query hooks: useReleasesQuery, useInsightsQuery
STANDARD_CACHE or FREQUENT_CACHE would be appropriate
ideas.implementation_approach: Create useContactsQuery.ts following the pattern of useReleasesQuery (fetches list for a profileId, uses STANDARD_CACHE, exports TypeScript types for Contact data).

ideas.title: Add useTourDatesQuery TanStack Query hook
ideas.description: Create a TanStack Query hook for fetching tour dates list. The tour dates domain has a comprehensive queryKeys structure but no query hook is exported.
ideas.rationale: queryKeys.tourDates includes list(), upcoming(), detail(), and connection() factories. Only mutations exist (useTourDateMutations.ts) but no query hook for fetching. This is inconsistent with other domains that have both queries and mutations.
existing_patterns: queryKeys.tourDates with list(), upcoming(), detail(), connection()
Mutation hooks already exist in useTourDateMutations.ts
API route exists at /api/tour-dates (likely)
ideas.implementation_approach: Create useTourDatesQuery.ts with hooks for list, upcoming, and detail views. Use FREQUENT_CACHE for upcoming shows, STANDARD_CACHE for full list. Export types for TourDate, TourDateListResponse.

ideas.title: Create /launch/features sibling page
ideas.description: Add a /launch/features page as a sibling to /launch/pricing, following the same pattern of extracted marketing pages with Linear design tokens.
ideas.rationale: The launch page was refactored to extract /launch/pricing as a separate page. A features page would follow this pattern and allow deeper exploration of individual features without bloating the main launch page.
existing_patterns: Launch page has sections for smart links, AI, audience, deeplinks
Pricing page uses same design tokens and component patterns
Both use revalidate = false for static generation
ideas.implementation_approach: Create /launch/features page with deep dives into each feature category (Smart Links, AI Assistant, Audience Intelligence, Deeplinks). Use same Linear design tokens, metadata pattern, and JSON-LD schema structure as pricing page.

ideas.title: Add Apple Music artist search query hook
ideas.description: Create useAppleMusicArtistSearchQuery hook following the Spotify search pattern. The file exists but may not be complete or exported.
ideas.rationale: useAppleMusicArtistSearchQuery.ts exists in lib/queries/ and is referenced in index.ts, but the implementation may be incomplete compared to useArtistSearchQuery (Spotify). Both should follow identical patterns for consistency.
existing_patterns: useArtistSearchQuery (Spotify) with debouncing, SEARCH_CACHE strategy
queryKeys.appleMusic.artistSearch() factory exists
API route at /api/apple-music/search likely exists
ideas.implementation_approach: Ensure useAppleMusicArtistSearchQuery mirrors useArtistSearchQuery implementation: same debouncing behavior, SEARCH_CACHE strategy, TypeScript types for AppleMusicArtistResult, enabled/disabled state based on query length.

ideas.title: Create cache strategy preset documentation generator
ideas.description: Build a utility that generates documentation from cache-strategies.ts showing which hooks use which cache strategies, with rationale.
ideas.rationale: cache-strategies.ts defines 7 cache presets (REALTIME, FREQUENT, STANDARD, STABLE, STATIC, PAGINATED, SEARCH) but there's no inventory of which hooks use which strategies. This would help maintain consistency and catch outliers.
existing_patterns: Similar pattern to TANSTACK_QUERY_INVENTORY.md documentation
Could use AST parsing or grep to find cache strategy usage
ideas.implementation_approach: Create a script that scans all query hook files, extracts which cache strategy each uses (via AST or regex), generates a markdown table mapping hook -> strategy -> rationale. Run via pnpm script.

ideas.title: Add CSV export utility for audience data
ideas.description: Create a CSV export utility specifically for audience/subscriber data, extending the existing csv.ts utility with audience-specific formatters.
ideas.rationale: lib/utils/csv.ts provides generic CSV export utilities. The audience page shows subscribers with engagement scoring, source attribution, etc. A specialized export would format this data appropriately for analysis.
existing_patterns: csv.ts has toCsv(), downloadCsv() utilities
download.ts has triggerDownload() helper
Audience data includes: visitor email/phone, engagement score, status, source, last action
ideas.implementation_approach: Create csv-audience.ts with exportAudienceToCsv() that formats subscriber data with proper headers (Visitor, Engagement, Status, Source, Last Action, Subscribed Date). Include formatters for engagement scores (High/Medium/Low) and date formatting.

ideas.title: Create route constants for API endpoints
ideas.description: Add API_ROUTES constant object alongside APP_ROUTES to centralize API endpoint paths and avoid string duplication.
ideas.rationale: APP_ROUTES in constants/routes.ts centralizes app navigation paths. API routes are currently hardcoded strings scattered across query hooks and mutations. Centralizing them would improve maintainability and type safety.
existing_patterns: APP_ROUTES object with typed routes
API routes follow REST patterns: /api/billing/status, /api/dashboard/profile, etc.
ideas.implementation_approach: Add API_ROUTES object to routes.ts with categories (billing, dashboard, admin, dsp, etc.). Update all query hooks to import API_ROUTES instead of hardcoded strings. Use TypeScript const assertions for type safety.

ideas.title: Add useMetadataQuery for runtime feature flags
ideas.description: Create a query hook for fetching runtime metadata/feature flags, following the pattern of useBuildInfoQuery for version monitoring.
ideas.rationale: useBuildInfoQuery exists for version monitoring. A similar pattern could be used for runtime feature flags, A/B test assignments, or dynamic configuration that needs client-side access.
existing_patterns: useBuildInfoQuery uses STABLE_CACHE for rarely-changing data
Could add queryKeys.metadata domain to keys.ts
Follows health check pattern
ideas.implementation_approach: Create useMetadataQuery with STABLE_CACHE strategy. API endpoint returns feature flags, experiment assignments, dynamic config. Use in components that need runtime configuration without rebuilding.

ideas.title: Extract shared metadata generation utility from launch pages
ideas.description: Create a generateMarketingMetadata() utility to share metadata generation logic across /launch, /launch/pricing, and future marketing pages.
ideas.rationale: Both launch/page.tsx and launch/pricing/page.tsx have nearly identical generateMetadata() implementations. Extracting to a shared utility would reduce duplication and ensure consistency.
existing_patterns: Both pages use APP_NAME, APP_URL constants
Both follow Next.js Metadata API pattern
Similar OpenGraph, Twitter, robots configuration
ideas.implementation_approach: Create generateMarketingMetadata(options) in lib/utils/marketing-metadata.ts. Accept title, description, path, keywords as parameters. Return full Metadata object with defaults for verification, robots, OpenGraph, Twitter. Reduce duplication by 80%.

ideas.title: Add useAdminCreatorsQuery TanStack Query hook
ideas.description: Create a query hook for fetching admin creators list with filters. The queryKeys.creators domain exists but no query hook is exported.
ideas.rationale: queryKeys.creators has list(), detail(), featured(), socialLinks() factories but no corresponding query hooks are exported from index.ts. Admin mutations exist (useCreatorMutations.ts) but queries are missing.
existing_patterns: queryKeys.creators with list(filters), detail(id), featured()
Admin mutations already exist
Likely uses STANDARD_CACHE or FREQUENT_CACHE
ideas.implementation_approach: Create useAdminCreatorsQuery.ts with hooks for list (with filters), detail (by ID), and featured creators. Use FREQUENT_CACHE for list (admin data changes often), STANDARD_CACHE for detail. Export types for Creator, CreatorFilters.

ideas.title: Create shared FeatureCard component for marketing pages
ideas.description: Extract the feature card pattern used across launch page sections into a reusable FeatureCard component.
ideas.rationale: Launch page repeats similar feature card patterns in multiple sections (pillars, features grid, AI features grid). A shared component would reduce duplication and ensure consistent styling.
existing_patterns: Feature cards with num/title/desc pattern (FIG 0.1, FIG 0.2, etc.)
AI features cards with icon/title/desc pattern
All use Linear design tokens and consistent spacing
ideas.implementation_approach: Create FeatureCard component accepting: variant ('numbered' | 'icon'), num, icon, title, desc props. Handle both numbered features (FIG 0.1) and icon features with conditional rendering. Use Linear tokens for styling.

ideas.title: Add useCampaignInvitesQuery TanStack Query hook
ideas.description: Export useCampaignInvitesQuery hook from index.ts. The file exists but is not exported in the barrel export.
ideas.rationale: useCampaignInvites.ts exists in lib/queries/ with preview and stats queries, but it's not exported from index.ts. This breaks the convention that all query hooks are exported from the barrel.
existing_patterns: All other query hooks are exported from index.ts
queryKeys.campaign domain exists with preview() and stats()
Admin-only feature for bulk creator invites
ideas.implementation_approach: Add export statement to lib/queries/index.ts for useCampaignInvitesQuery and related types. Verify the hook follows TanStack Query best practices (cache strategy, TypeScript types).

ideas.title: Create utility for generating JSON-LD schema
ideas.description: Extract JSON-LD generation logic into a reusable utility following the pattern established in launch/page.tsx.
ideas.rationale: Launch page has comprehensive JSON-LD schema generation (WebSite, SoftwareApplication, Organization) with XSS protection. This pattern should be reusable for other marketing pages that need structured data.
existing_patterns: jsonLd() helper with XSS protection via replaceAll('<', '\u003c')
Schema types: WebSite, SoftwareApplication, Organization
Uses APP_NAME, APP_URL constants
ideas.implementation_approach: Enhance lib/utils/json-ld.ts to include typed schema generators: generateWebSiteSchema(), generateSoftwareApplicationSchema(), generateOrganizationSchema(). Accept options objects for customization. Maintain XSS protection pattern.

ideas.title: Add useWaitlistStatusQuery TanStack Query hook
ideas.description: Export useWaitlistStatusQuery hook from index.ts. The file exists but is not in the barrel export.
ideas.rationale: useWaitlistStatusQuery.ts exists in lib/queries/ but is not exported from index.ts. This creates an inconsistency where some hooks must be imported directly while others use the barrel export.
existing_patterns: useWaitlistMutations is already exported from index.ts
queryKeys.waitlist domain exists with status() factory
Chat hooks are similarly not exported (intentional for chat)
ideas.implementation_approach: Add export statement to lib/queries/index.ts for useWaitlistStatusQuery and related types. Verify it follows the same pattern as other exported query hooks.

ideas.title: Create auth flow utilities from SignUpForm patterns
ideas.description: Extract reusable auth flow utilities from SignUpForm.tsx: redirect URL building, email prefill, sanitization helpers.
ideas.rationale: SignUpForm.tsx has buildSignInUrl() helper and redirect URL sanitization logic that could be useful in other auth flows (sign-in, password reset, etc.). Extracting to lib/auth/ would enable reuse.
existing_patterns: buildSignInUrl() with email and redirect_url preservation
sanitizeRedirectUrl() from lib/auth/constants.ts
Similar pattern likely needed for buildSignUpUrl(), buildResetPasswordUrl()
ideas.implementation_approach: Create lib/auth/url-builders.ts with buildSignInUrl(), buildSignUpUrl(), buildResetPasswordUrl() helpers. Each accepts email and redirectUrl parameters, handles sanitization, returns pathname + search. Refactor SignUpForm to use the shared utility.

ideas.title: Add pagination utility for infinite scroll patterns
ideas.description: Create a pagination/cursor utility specifically for TanStack Query infinite queries, extending the PAGINATED_CACHE pattern.
ideas.rationale: PAGINATED_CACHE strategy exists in cache-strategies.ts for infinite queries, but there's no shared utility for cursor-based pagination logic. Many API endpoints likely follow the same cursor/limit pattern.
existing_patterns: PAGINATED_CACHE strategy for infinite queries
pagination-parser.ts exists for basic pagination
Many query hooks accept cursor/limit parameters
ideas.implementation_approach: Create infinite-scroll.ts with utilities for: buildCursorKey(cursor, limit), extractNextCursor(response), createInfiniteQueryOptions(). Provide TypeScript generics for type safety. Include helpers for 'load more' button state and scroll detection.

ideas.title: Create MockBar reusable component
ideas.description: Extract the MockBar browser chrome component from launch page into a shared marketing component.
ideas.rationale: MockBar (lines 215-231 in launch/page.tsx) is used multiple times on the launch page for mockup screenshots. It could be reused in other marketing pages or documentation.
existing_patterns: Used 4+ times on launch page with different URLs
Simple component with url prop and Linear design tokens
Shows browser chrome dots and URL bar
ideas.implementation_approach: Extract to components/marketing/MockBar.tsx. Accept url string prop. Use Linear tokens for border, text color. Export as standalone component with JSDoc documentation.

ideas.title: Add API route for exporting audience CSV
ideas.description: Create a server-side API route that generates and streams CSV exports of audience data, complementing code-006's client-side utility.
ideas.rationale: CSV export for large datasets (1000+ subscribers) should be server-generated to avoid client memory issues. This follows the pattern of existing API routes and can be triggered by the client-side download utility.
existing_patterns: Existing /api/dashboard/audience/subscribers route
CSV utility functions in lib/utils/csv.ts
Similar pattern as data export in useAccountMutations
ideas.implementation_approach: Create GET /api/dashboard/audience/export route that streams CSV response. Use csv.ts toCsv() utility. Set Content-Type: text/csv and Content-Disposition headers. Support query params for filtering (date range, engagement level).

ideas.title: Create design token documentation generator
ideas.description: Build a utility that scans design-system.css and globals.css to generate documentation of all available design tokens and their usage.
ideas.rationale: The Linear-Match workflow involved extensive design token work. A documentation generator would catalog all --linear-* and --color-* tokens, show their values, and track which components use which tokens.
existing_patterns: Tokens defined in :root of design-system.css
@theme inline blocks register Tailwind utilities
Linear design reference in MEMORY.md
ideas.implementation_approach: Create script that parses CSS files, extracts :root variables and @theme inline declarations. Generate markdown with token name, value, category (color/spacing/typography), and usage examples. Run as part of docs build.

ideas.title: Add server action for updating release metadata
ideas.description: Create a server action for release mutations following the pattern of existing server actions, as an alternative to the REST API approach.
ideas.rationale: Tour dates and other mutations use server actions (mentioned in MEMORY.md), but releases use REST API mutations (useReleaseMutations.ts). Server actions would provide type safety and reduce boilerplate.
existing_patterns: Server actions used for tour dates (per MEMORY.md)
Existing spotify.ts server action in app/actions/
useReleaseMutations has: refresh, rescan ISRC, reset override, save override, sync from Spotify
ideas.implementation_approach: Create app/actions/releases.ts with 'use server' directive. Export async functions for each release mutation. Use Zod for validation. Update useReleaseMutations to call server actions instead of API routes. Provides better type safety and DX.
